TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XamlParseException extends System.SystemException

Attribute.AttributeName: Serializable

summary.span: 表示來自 WPF XAML 剖析器之剖析器特有例外狀況的例外狀況類別。

span.span: Represents the exception class for parser-specific exceptions from a WPF XAML parser.

summary.span: 這個例外狀況用於 .NET Framework 3.0 和 .NET Framework 3.5 中的 XAML API 或 WPF XAML 剖析器作業，或特別供 WPF XAML 剖析器在呼叫 API 時使用。

span.span: This exception is used in XAML API or WPF XAML parser operations from .NET Framework 3.0 and .NET Framework 3.5, or for specific use of the WPF XAML parser by calling API.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 僅用於執行 WPF 應用程式的剖析和載入 XAML 的 WPF 實作的 XAML 剖析器。 is used only for the WPF-implemented XAML parser that performs the XAML parsing and loading for WPF applications. 具體來說，例外狀況是只時應用程式之目標[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]。Specifically, the exception is only relevant when an application targets [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]. 例外狀況也可能來自執行階段內執行的 WPF 應用程式載入從 XAML 的 WPF 實作的 XAML 剖析器將連結的 Api 呼叫中的使用者程式碼 (例如，若要呼叫)。The exception can also originate from user code in run-time calls to APIs that hook up the WPF-implemented XAML parser to load XAML from within a running WPF application (for example, calls to ). 針對[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]，則通常會報告 XAML 處理例外狀況的例外狀況定義在不同的命名空間 () 和不同的組件 (System.Xaml)。For [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the exception that typically reports XAML processing exceptions is defined in a different namespace () and a different assembly (System.Xaml). 除非您是對等項目寫入 WPF XAML 剖析器，或使用[!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)]並[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]目標，您通常不會擲回從您自己的程式碼。Unless you are writing an equivalent to the WPF XAML parser or working with [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] targeting, you generally will not throw from your own code. 不過，有時候是必要的例外狀況處理。However, handling for the exception is sometimes necessary. 應用程式案例，其中您可能想要隱藏 XAML 剖析錯誤，如應用程式層級的事件處理常式是一種方式處理執行階段。For application scenarios, where you may want to suppress XAML parse errors, a event handler at the application level is one way to handle a run-time . 是否要隱藏例外狀況，或將這些介面給使用者程式碼取決於您如何設計您的應用程式載入 XAML，以利和載入，您將指派給 XAML 應用程式的信任層級。Whether to suppress exceptions or let them surface to user code depends on how you design your application for purposes of loading XAML, and the trust level that you assign to the XAML your application loads. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XAML 安全性考量](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-security-considerations.md)或 [XAML 安全性] 區段[XAML 概觀 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。For more information, see [XAML Security Considerations](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/xaml-security-considerations.md) or "XAML Security" section of [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md). 頁面的 應用程式，當會擲回，它通常是在內容中`InitializeComponent`page 類別，這是 WPF 應用程式模型的使用方式在每個頁面層級的 WPF XAML 剖析器的進入點所做的呼叫。For pages of an application, when the is thrown, it is usually in the context of the `InitializeComponent` call made by your page class, which is the entry point for the WPF application model's usage of the WPF XAML parser at the per-page level. 因此另一個可能的處理策略就是放置`try/catch`區塊，以`InitializeComponent`。Therefore another possible handling strategy is to place `try/catch` blocks in `InitializeComponent`. 不過，不會整合這項技術，這是搭配視覺化設計介面的範本，並產生其他來源的攔截程序增加`InitializeComponent`。However, this technique does not integrate well with templates, visual design surfaces and other generated sources that hook up `InitializeComponent`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跨應用程式網域或電腦界限，此類型的例外狀況封送處理時，這個建構函式用於序列化。This constructor is used for serialization when marshaling an exception of this type across an application domain or machine boundary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為先前的例外狀況直接結果擲回的例外狀況應該包含先前的例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.

summary.span: 在擲回例外狀況時取得基底 URI 資訊。

span.span: Gets base URI information when the exception is thrown.
The parser context base URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底 URI 時，使用者可能可以使用剖析器內容因為發生例外狀況。Base URI is potentially available because of parser context when the exception occurred. 了解基底 URI 可用於偵錯的情況下，資源解析錯誤的根本原因。Knowing the base URI can be useful for debugging cases where a resource resolution error is the underlying cause.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定以序列化為目標的所有例外狀況物件資料的物件。 sets a object with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 在還原序列化期間，從在資料流上傳輸的 重新組成例外狀況。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the transmitted over the stream.
